page.title: 16SCAR
page.content: {Mr.J.Dearness},his wife and two sons have been living at{Scar}for the past four years but the large farmhouse was built a century ago. The house now has{22 rooms}though many are unused. The farm livestock consists mainly of {100 cattle},though there are sheep.In Winter the cattle are fed mainly{silage},though with some hay. The farm owns five working tractors to cover the{248 acres}of land on which mostly silage and{hay}are harvested.The farmers are kept busy all day and most of the evening. Although most big houses have a basement,Scar doesn't,but has a small wine cellar at the very top of the house which is reached by climbing 4 staircases.It is worth mentioning that some people believe a{ghost}inhabits Scar although{Mr.Dearness}doesn't believe it.
